publisher.publisher-name: Military Operations Research Society in cooperation with the Military Applications Society (MAS) of the Institute for Operations Research and Management Science (INFORMS)

title-group.article-title: Results of the ITEA LVC Conference Focus Session on Verification, Validation, and Accreditation (VV&A)
title-group.subtitle: Putting the “A” in VV&A: VV&A of Live, Virtual, and Constructive Test Environments

bio.p: Eileen Bjorkman, Senior Advisor, BS in Computer Science from the University of Washington, BS and MS in Aeronautical Engineering from AFIT, working on PhD in Systems Engineering at George Washington University.
